# Language Proposals

This directory contains proposals for language features and enhancements.

## Contents

- **KEEP-Result-Pattern-Proposal.md** - Official KEEP proposal for native Result pattern support in Kotlin
- **KOTLIN_RESULT_PATTERN_PROPOSAL.md** - Draft/working version of the Result pattern proposal
- **KEEP-Result-Pattern-Proposal.pdf** - PDF version of the KEEP proposal

## Related

- [Kotlin KEEP Repository](https://github.com/Kotlin/KEEP)
- [KEEP-0127: Standard Library Result<T>](https://github.com/Kotlin/KEEP/blob/main/proposals/stdlib/KEEP-0127-result.md)
